title: Add a Variable of Repeating Pattern
repeatPatternVarName: Variable name for the repeating pattern of values (update if the variable already exists)
repeatingValues: Comma separated number and/or string values to be repeated (e.g., 1,Blue,5,Bad,Good,3,7,0)
repeatFrequencyEach: (Optional) Comma separated number of times each item above to be repeated (e.g., 1,5,2,2,2,3,3,3)
times: Number of times the entire group of items to be repeated (if left blank, patterns will repeat to fill the dataset length)

help.title: Add a Variable of Repeating Pattern
help.body:
Description
Add a variable (i.e., column) to the dataset for a specified repeating pattern

Generate a character string or a number patterns or combination of both strings and number patterns in a new column of the dataset (e.g. 5x red / 5x blue / 5x yellow à with a repetition of the sequence of 10 OR a sequence of 3x1 / 3x2 / 3x3 …)
